Headline: #21 Cermak Temporary Reroute
ShortDescription: #21 buses will operate in both directions via Cermak, Loomis, Archer, Halsted and Cermak.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
How does this affect my trip?
Buses will operate in both directions via Cermak, Loomis, Archer, Halsted and Cermak. 

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: O'Hare-bound Blue Line Service Delayed at Forest Park
ShortDescription: O'Hare-bound Blue Line trains are standing at Forest Park due to a door problem on a train. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
O'Hare-bound Blue Line trains are standing at Forest Park due to a door problem on a train. 

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
